text: Greg "Fingers" Taylor (June 3, 1951 â€“ November 23, 2023) was an American harmonica player. He played with Jimmy Buffett's Coral Reefer Band. Taylor has released five studio albums: Harpoon Man (1984), Chest Pains (1991), New Fingerprints (1992), Old Rock 'n' Roller (1996) and Hi Fi Baby (2003). He has also released two compilation albums: Greatest Hits (1998) and Back to the Blues (2000). Taylor no longer performed live because he was suffered from Alzheimer's disease, died on November 23, 2023, at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American blues singers Category:American blues musicians Category:American singer- songwriters Category:American rock singers Category:American rock musicians Category:American country singers Category:American country musicians Category:Musicians from Wichita, Kansas Category:Singers from Wichita, Kansas Category:Writers from Wichita, Kansas Category:People with Alzheimer's disease
title: Greg "Fingers" Taylor
